message:
Thanks! I just have the feeling that many Rspatial users hasn’t transition yet to {terra} from {raster}, so obviously the usage of a supporting package as {tidyterra} is limited.

However I compiled some use cases on the {tidyterra} website, check the section "Other Media", see [https://dieghernan.github.io/tidyterra/](https://dieghernan.github.io/tidyterra/)
message_html:
Thanks! I just have the feeling that many Rspatial users hasn’t transition yet to {terra} from {raster}, so obviously the usage of a supporting package as {tidyterra} is limited.

However I compiled some use cases on the {tidyterra} website, check the section “Other Media”, see https://dieghernan.github.io/tidyterra/
